mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_PWD FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_Id} AND MEMBER_STATUS = 0
SELECT MEMBER_CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_Id} AND MEMBER_STATUS = 0

SELECT M.MEMBER_CODE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_PWD, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, M.MEMBER_STATUS, M.MEMBER_CLASS, M.MEMBER_INTRODUCTION, M.MEMBER_AGE, M.MEMBER_JOB, M.MEMBER_PHONE, M.MEMBER_SMSCONFIRMATION, M.MEMBER_GENDER, L.LOCATION_NAME, C.CATEGORY_NAME, F.FILES_CODE, F.FILES_BOARDTYPE, F.FILES_NAME, NL.NEEDLEVEL_LEVEL FROM MEMBER M JOIN LOCATION L ON(M.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE) LEFT JOIN INTERESTCATEGORY IC ON(M.MEMBER_CODE = IC.MEMBER_CODE) LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C ON(IC.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN FILES F ON(M.MEMBER_CODE = F.MEMBER_CODE) JOIN NEED N ON(M.MEMBER_CODE = N.MEMBER_CODE) JOIN NEEDLEVEL NL ON(N.NEEDLEVEL_CODE = NL.NEEDLEVEL_CODE) WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{member_Id} AND M.MEMBER_STATUS = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER_MEMBER_CODE.NEXTVAL, #{member_Id}, #{member_Pwd}, #{member_Nickname}, SYSDATE, 0, null, 0, #{member_Introduction}, #{member_Age}, #{member_Job}, #{location_Code}, #{member_Phone}, #{member_SMSConfirmation}, #{member_Gender})
INSERT INTO FILES VALUES(SEQ_FILES_FILES_CODE.NEXTVAL, 0, #{files_OriginName}, #{files_Name}, SYSDATE, 0, null, #{member_Code}, null, null, null, 0)
INSERT INTO REWARD (REWARD_CODE, REWARD_TYPE, REWARD_STATUS, MEMBER_CODE, REWARD_APPDATE) VALUES (SEQ_REWARD_REWARD_CODE.NEXTVAL, 0, 0, #{member_Code}, SYSDATE)
